import { Card, CardGrid } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

## Features

<CardGrid stagger>
	<Card title="Filecoin Pay" icon="seti:javascript">
		Manage Pay account and service payments rails. 
	</Card>
	<Card title="Storage" icon="seti:default">
		Upload and download data to the Filecoin network.
	</Card>
	<Card title="React Hooks" icon="seti:react">
		React hooks for wallet, account, balance, transations, signing and more.
	</Card>
	<Card title="AI support" icon="magnifier">
		Index this website with your editor and add to your LLM context easily with `llms.txt` support.
	</Card>
</CardGrid>
